name: Anindya Maiti
content: Anindya Maiti | About Me ABOUT ME RESEARCH SERVICES CV Anindya Maiti Security researcher by profession, technology enthusiast by hobby. Strong advocate of a secure, open, and free (as in freedom) Internet. Founder of GeoSNO, a distributed cloud storage service provider. Co-inventor of CryptoMiner, a blockchain-inspired educational board game. When away from computers, I would brew coffee, eat ramen, fix my beater car, and catch Pokémon in national parks. I am an Assistant Professor of Computer Science and Data Science and Analytics at the University of Oklahoma (OU), where I direct the SecretLab. SecretLab's research focus secretly lies in the areas of privacy and security, information assurance and network security, and applied AI/ML. I also serve as the Outreach Coordinator and Backend Systems Lead for ScooterLab, an NSF-funded micromobility test-bed in San Antonio, TX. Cool News: Join fellow hackers at Hacklahoma 2024 on February 10-11, 2024. Honored with Outstanding Faculty Award at OU. Serving on the IEEE S&P 2024 program committee. Email am@ou.edu University of Oklahoma anindya.maiti@utsa.edu UT San Antonio root@geosno.com GeoSNO Phone +1 (405) 325-4951 Office (OU) +1 (405) 723-8814 Mobile (USA) +61 458 502 928 Mobile (Australia) Crypto PGP Public Key BTC Address ETH Address Office Devon Energy Hall 210G 110 W Boyd St, Norman, Oklahoma 73019, USA.
